mapper.sql: id, order_info_id, task_code, task_name, sort, days, day_flag, operators, minutes, score, remarks, status, reason, up_time, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.task_code, t.task_name, t.sort, t.days, t.day_flag, t.minutes, t.score, t.remarks, t.status, t.activation_switch, t1.userName operators, t1.member_user_id userId, t1.userName userName from ( select t.id orderId,t.offer_info_id, t1.qie, t2.task_id, t3.group_code,t3.group_name, t4.task_code,t4.task_name,t4.sort,t4.days,t4.day_flag,t4.minutes,t4.score,t4.remarks,t4.status,t4.activation_switch from (select id,offer_info_id from order_info where id=#{orderId}) t left join offer_info t1 on t1.id = t.offer_info_id left join quotation_template t2 on t2.id = t1.qie left join task_group t3 on t3.id = t2.task_id left join waybill_task t4 on t4.group_code = t3.group_code ) t left join ( select t.id orderId,t.customer_id, t1.operation_team_id, t2.group_code,t2.group_name, t3.member_user_id,t3.task_id, t4.name userName, t5.task_code,t5.task_name from (select id,customer_id from order_info where id=#{orderId}) t join ( select DISTINCT t1.id,substring_index( substring_index(t1.operation_team_id,',',t2.id + 1), ',' ,-1 ) as operation_team_id from (select id,operation_team_id from customer ) t1 join help_index t2 on t2.id < (length(t1.operation_team_id) - length(REPLACE(t1.operation_team_id,',','')) + 1 ) ) t1 on t1.id = t.customer_id join operation_team t2 on t2.id = t1.operation_team_id join operation_team_member t3 on t3.operation_team_id = t2.id join system_user t4 on t4.id = t3.member_user_id join task t5 on t5.id = t3.task_id ) t1 on t1.task_code = t.task_code and t1.task_name = t.task_name;
